name: uploadXML
description: **Install Dependencies**\ npm init -y\ npm install typescript\ npx tsc --init\ npm install express @types/express\ npm install nodemon @types/nodemon\ npm install --save-dev concurrently\ in package.json to run multiple command concurrently:\   "scripts": {\     "start": "concurrently \"npm run start:server\" \"npm run start:watch\"",\     "start:server": "nodemon --watch 'src/**/*.ts' --exec ts-node src/app.ts",\     "start:watch": "tsc --watch"   }
